author: adityapatwardhan
body:
This reverts commit 01fe7c24eb58b18e0bf07c6f1f7fc14c42cf2208 to workaround macOS packaging issue.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: This is a temporary workaround?  Can you file an issue to investigate an restore this code?

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
@TravisEz13  yes, filed issue to remove workaround
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/5262

title: Revert "Add macos launcher. (#5138)"
